amendment.description: Amendment clarifies the deadline for filing patent term extension applications covering drug products that must be approved by the FDA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 112-111 to restore language for calculation of 60-day period for application of patent term extension that the managers amendment strikes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 198 (Roll no. 485).
